title: Motorola 592 L Smart Wifi Enabled Frost Free Side by Side Refrigerator  (Premium Black, 592HSMTB)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Refrigerator Unit, User Manual, 2 Egg Tray, Ice Box
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: Smart Storage Designed for the Indian Home, 34% Freezer Space, 64% Fridge Space, Double Crispers for Veggies and Fruits, 2 L Bottle Storage, An Ice Box That's Also a Bottle, 2 Movable Ice Box, Leco Deodorizer to Maintain Long Lasting Freshness, Photocatalysis Light Based Technology, Odour Kill Technology, Fresh and Hygenic, Removes Bacteria, Longer Life with 10 Years Compressor Warranty, Low Noise Levels Greater than 43 dB, Stabilizer Free Operation, WiFi Enabled Smart Control, Multi Air Flow
product_specification.Other Features: Manage Your Smart Fridge with Your Smart Phone, TruWiFi, Set Temperature Remotely, Fast Freeze Mode, Smart Mode, Auto Error Notification, Smart Sensor for Accurate Temperature Control, TruSmart Sensor, Load Sensor, Ambient Temperature Sensor, Optimized Cooling, Evaporator Temperature Sensor, Freezer Temperature Sensor, Fridge Temperature Sensor, Designed for Best-in-class Cooling, Efficient Heat Transfer, Faster Cooling, 8% Faster Speed BLDC Fan Motor, Minus 32 DegreeC Coldest Freezer, Longer Condenser and Evaporator, Uniform Cooling in Every Part for Longer Freshness, SurroundCoolX, Maintains Freshness, Prevents Moisture Loss, Super Cooling Modes for Impromptu Party Plans, Rapid Temperature Cool Down, Preserves Freshness, Upto 25% Faster Ice Making Time, Premium Design to Complement a Stylish Home, Digital Control Panel, Flat Door Design, LED Lighting, Up to 40% More Energy Efficient, Adaptive Inverter Technology
product_specification.Installation & Demo: Explain all the functionality of the product||Flipkart will facilitate Installation & Demo at time of your convenience from a brand authorized service engineer|| All additional accessories which are not part of the the package will be charged separately ||Flipkart will communicate the day and time slot of the scheduled Installation & Demo through a SMS and the same information will also be available in your order details page||Please note that any unauthorized handling or self-installation of the product will lead to return & product warranty being void.||The Installation & Demo service will be provided free of cost
product_specification.Warranty Service Type: For Warranty claims or any product related issues please email at support.moto@flipkart.com or call us at 080-46331090
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product and 10 Years on Compressor
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase. Against Defective Material and Workmanship.
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Plastic Parts, Glassware, Any Accessories External to the Product, if the Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual, Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That Do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence. Warranty Automatically Expires After the Stipulated Period of Original Purchase Even if the Refrigerator was Not in Use for Anytime for Whatsoever Reasons.

product_description.TruWifi: This truly smart, truly revolutionary refrigerator helps you change temperatures and modes whenever you require – anytime and from anywhere. Choose from Fast Freeze and Smart Modes based on your requirements. Your wifi-enabled smartphone connects with your refrigerator and notifies you in case of any errors, such as leaving its door open or any technical error, among other things.
product_description.TruSmart Sensors: This Smart Refrigerator comes with intelligent sensors that help monitor the ambient temperature and internal load inside the refrigerator to help change the temperature inside the refrigerator automatically for optimal cooling and energy usage.

review:
Bought this refrigerator in big billion days delivered 2 days in advance and same day installation.

I was using single door less than 200 L refrigerator. Motorola 592 L is not only spacious also looks elegant and I’m very excited.

The smart wifi allows you to change controls through EZ smart Home app.
Frost free works fine. The LED white lights covers each side and bright enough.

2 movable ice boxes and a small ice tray. Double basket in the fridge and freezer give ample space to store.

Initially when you switch on, the Inverter side of the fridge heats up and it’s normal.
Feather touch panels works fine except the child lock( need to wait 3mins to lock the fridge after you press lock button, never worked for me).

Delivery is earlier than the mentioned date by Flipkart. Local delivery executive has given good support by all means. Exchange of my LG 9 year old Double Door Refrigerator was done smoothly. Got it at a very good price. Installation person visited within no time after delivery happened. Even though this refrigerator is the first to be seen by him in our location, he explored and given some demo and mentioned about the smart app to use in order to avail smart functions from our mobile itself. Product Quality is good, finishing also done a good job by Motorola. Spacing is well enough to place almost everything. As this is the first of its kind, we need to see the durability. Hope everything should be fine to use for longer years like LG.

It is a very good purchase .. 592L of happiness..freezer and normal compartments work really well.. looks really classy and sometimes the heat gets dissipated through the side walls but that is common in all side by side refrigerators..silent performer.. very much recommended..

Hai The Demo Team Should be More Knowledgeable So that they can give a proper Guidance...Child Lock how to enable it...How to use the Smart Wifi Application all should be done with proper Guidance and Knowledge...This is My feedback based on my experience

Took a risk by buying the Motorola refrigerator when compared to a standard Samsung or LG! But to my surprise, the refrigerator is great overall. The features, design and looks of the refrigerator is great! Cooling is extremely good and temperature can be controlled through wi-fi (app based). Refrigerator is deep black but has some designs on the upper part which does not look great at certain viewing angles. For now, extremely happy with the purchase at the price!
Delightful with the Product, Awesome Space for everything. First to buy in the State, Hopeful everything goes fine with the Function and Running of the Product.

Product is good for the price... Also cooling is good.. however few cons i noticed are below:

Fridge sides get heated up some times, as per engineer this is normal.
In the freezer section i see a thin level of ice being formed, being a frost free model don't think this is a normal behaviour..

Apart from this product works well

Product looks awesome and delivered as expected.exchanged my old refrigerator for best price Thanks a lot for that..Installation is bit intresting. The guy who did the installation , it is his first-time for this product. He just unpacked and plugged in. He is not aware of any of the product functionality.dissappointed with that.otherwise pretty happy with the product. Side walls of the refrigerator were too hot soon after switching on for few hours, then it does become normal. Build quality is more than good and recommend.

The product is just fine from the day of its purchase, the look is nice, the feel is good and the cooling is just great. The only downside that I'd say is the overheating of the side panels, not sure if this is how it feels with any side by side refrigerator or Motorola is the exception. Would be nice If Motorola could expand their after-sales technical support base and send knowledgeable technicians for inspecting the performance of the product atleaset for the 1st year of its purchase.

I bought this refrigerator recently and I must say I'm quite impressed so far. The delivery and installation was on time, as promised. They delivered it on the 2nd floor but I had to take the assistance of a few neighbors, so be mindful of that. Coming back to the refrigerator, the touch screen is easy to use and performance has been good so far but the long term reliability is something I'd like to see. If the product manages to last as long as some of the competitors like Samsung and LG i don't see why this wont be selling like hot cakes :) There is ample space for fruits, veggies and other stuff and you can set the temperature either manually or through the smart mode. You can also connect the refrigerator to your phone and control the temperature from your bedroom easily in case you forget to do it. All in all I'd say it's worth looking at considering it costs almost 20k less than the competition.

I bought this refrigerator recently and I must say I'm quite impressed so far. The delivery and installation was on time, as promised. They delivered it on the 2nd floor but I had to take the assistance of a few neighbors, so be mindful of that. Coming back to the refrigerator, the touch screen is easy to use and performance has been good so far but the long term reliability is something I'd like to see. If the product manages to last as long as some of the competitors like Samsung and LG i don't see why this wont be selling like hot cakes :) There is ample space for fruits, veggies and other stuff and you can set the temperature either manually or through the smart mode. You can also connect the refrigerator to your phone and control the temperature from your bedroom easily in case you forget to do it. All in all I'd say it's worth looking at considering it costs almost 20k less than the competition.

It's a great product. Pretty new in the market but it's robust with great configuration, can change and adjust the temperature manually as well as via an app as well. Great design, look and a very sophisticated product and rich in class and looks
We are using this product from last two months. Perrformance wise absolutely awesome, happy with the storage and installation process. Only one improvement area is motorola can work on looks wise.

Doesn't look that premium, if it was a glass panel it would look super sexy. There are some issues with fit and finish. Both door are not properly aligned and over all outer body is ok Ok not that good
, delivery personnel doesn't have much knowledge about the fridge, it is very difficult to use display. Cooling is very good and there is enough space to fit one more shelf but they didn't provide that. And also company has not provided any information regarding electricity consumption.

Writing this review after a week of use. The product is a marvel! Worth every penny. Looks amazing, works like a dream. The installation wasn't upto the mark. The installation guy had no idea what he was doing. He was more interested in clicking selfies of himself with the product installed, face mask and sanitizer. I found the need for additional shelves and emailed Motorola for the same. Unfortunately even they have no idea and asked me to contact flipkart. Would have given 5 stars if additional shelves were sold separately.

Product is good but we needed more shelves for refrigerator. We tried to get the information on the same from Flipkart and Motorola but no positive response. Both informing to contact other. Really miserable. How can a product success in market without accessories / spares clarity. Purchased due to name of Motorola and services of Flipkart BUT highly disappointed.
Hope somebody from their end should read this and contact me
Value for Money

Giving Reviews after 6 month use, working perfect , frost free also working good, wifi enabled , you can use ezhome app to control this from anywhere . No heating issue 100% satisfied with this product

Flip kart send me damage product and it's material quality si totally poor and when I rais request for refund they refuse and also can not return product its technical person say this is big refrigrator so it's got damage during transportation is normal so it's door not close properly we have to push door after it's close and door material is very chip quality plastic.

It's one of the best in this range.

Value of money

Motorola 592L Side by Side Refrigerator is a value for money purchase. Quick delivery as promised, and installation on next day by Jeeves was quicker than promised. Just reviewing after 24 hrs of usage, Cools faster, even though it is 592L. Connecting to Wifi was a snap and the app did recognize it quickly too. Just entered the world of connected Home Appliances. Hope it will not disappoint.
Thank You Flipkart/EKart/Jeeves !!
Note: Still disappointed that Ekart did not take my old working Refrigerator in Exchange, as it had rust on the door. Those who are interested in exchanging please go through the terms and conditions carefully. They only take back Appliances in near perfect conditions.

Absolute value for money. Huge storage capacity for this price with wifi enabled features. Got this for lowest price during big billion days offer. Delivery was great as the delivery guys carried successfully to first floor.

Absolutely recommended ! It has got space and in this price range it is a steal !!! Go for it...

Side panel getting very much hot. Very dangerous if you have kids at home. Support person says that it get get hot till 60 degree. Worst product.

Was looking for side by side refrigerators, after doing study of so many options, drilled down to Motorola for below reasons:
1. Brand name. In this price range all brands are Chinese.
2. Inverter compressor
3. Wifi feature (does not help much, but added advantage)

Everything is perfect with the fridge. Let's hope it runs the same way.
Only problem was with the exchange guys. They were very reluctant to take the old fridge, which was working perfectly fine and didn't have any cracks or rust. Only issue was with its leg. There was one leg missing and they were not ready to take the product back. After long discussions and waiting for around 1 hour. They accepted to take it back. Very bad behaviour!! The leg could've broke during the transit as well, the way they handled the old fridge was also bad. It that was the case, they should've taken it initially only.

Installation: Installation was good, the technican has good knowledge on the product and explained the features

answers: A:Yes, we do.. It's really convenient to have a separate freezer .
A:No issue which I am facing till now
A:Either through touch panel or through app, you can set custom temperatures or choose from preset modes
A:No, as of now. I purchased it 3 months back
A:The unit can run well in the voltage range of 160~260V
A:Yes left side is freezer but there is section below in bottom where u can keep ice tray
A:Yes. U can set different temp.
A:The left side is totally freezer , and it's not convertible
A:No, but freezer is too good. And u could control the temperature separately, via touch panel.
A:wifi function is for setting temperature though its of no use. reconnecting is like fighting a war. No u cant connect it with Alexa or Google assistant
A:I am using it for last 4 months, I don't see any option to add additional trays. moreover, it has pretty big storage, additional trays should not be required.
A:dimension already mentioned. space required is as per findings mentioned.
A:racks are adjustable and enough slots are available to accomodate large vessels. we could accomodate upto 7kg capacity vessels inside fridge.
A:it has lock feature , but not a physical key. You have to hold lock key for 3 seconds to unlock.
A:Anyone with a smartphone & EZ app downloaded can operate the fridge via the app
A:It has less than 43dB sound level
A:Please refer to the 1 page consumer insert which is received with the product
